- Apple Watch Support: Now with the Cliq Watch App, you can view your recent chats and reply to messages with preset phrases, locations and emojis.

Muted Chats fix:

Our muted chats filter had a small glitch wherein few unmuted chats were displayed under it. We have fixed it in this update. So update your Cliq app now and enjoy muted chats filter only for muted chats!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- A new language for you
Cliq app now supports Simplified Chinese language.
- Audio & Video message after calls
Send an audio or video message after a call, if the user was unavailable at the time of call.
- Cliq Platform
Creating a poll, executing a command, etc... is now just a click away. Yes, Cliq app now supports the entire Platform components.

Our latest update comes with new features that will for sure make things more easier for you than it already is.

Muted Chats: No more crowding and distractions in your chat list view as muted chats are now moved into a separate folder that will be displayed only when you click on the muted list chat icon.

Share Channels easily: Now who wouldn't want a link that when shared will enable others to either view the channel or join the channel accordingly? Cliq now provides Channel Permalink - a link that you can use as a reference to access that channel from another chat or for new users to join.
Do note that Permalink works based on the privacy of Channel levels.

Chatlets: Finally the chats you initiate in Zoho Connect and Zoho Mail with your colleagues can now be accessed in your Cliq app.

Hope these features are a real boost for your everyday productivity. See you soon with more cool features in our next update.

Night mode: Switch to night mode during after-work hours and experience a dimmer, minimalistic screen display.

SSO (Single sign-on): Access all your Zoho apps through a single sign-in process for authentication. Cliq is now integrated with Zoho OneAuth to access all your Zoho apps

Feature discovery: Receive contextual cues to explore and make the most of all of Cliq's functionalities- from file sharing to video calling, with the new feature discovery option.  

Leave Group Chat: Feel free to leave a group chat with the new Leave option.

 
With our latest update, we have also fixed a few bugs so you will have an enhanced, seamless experience on Cliq.

Bottom Sheet: We have redesigned message action UI. With the new design, you can view all actions in one go and perform a search to find a specific action.

Siri Shortcuts: In addition to Siri Support, we are now extending our support with Siri Shortcuts for devices running iOS 12 and above. You can now set your status, open unread chats, open starred messages and more using shortcuts. Adding to that, Siri will smartly show suggestions on your lock screen and search.

To add a shortcut head to Settings -> Siri Shortcuts -> Add to Siri -> set a phrase of your liking.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Dynamic forms: Cliq now supports Dynamic Forms, using this you can streamline your complex business workflows. Be it reporting a bug, scheduling a call with a prospect, onboarding an employee, or claiming a reimbursement—it can be done right from Cliq iOS app.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Dynamic forms: Cliq now supports Dynamic Forms, using this you can streamline your complex business workflows. Be it reporting a bug, scheduling a call with a prospect, onboarding an employee, or claiming a reimbursement—it can be done right from Cliq iOS app.

Swipe to Reply: Replies are now just a swipe away. Swipe left to right over any message to reply quickly.

Audio recording lock: Record and send voice messages without having to hold the record button using the new audio recording lock. Slide up while recording to enable the lock.

Edit Channel info: You can now edit a channel’s image, name and description right within the app.

Redesigned attachment sheet: Accelerate the way you attach media, files, location, etc. with the new and improved attachment sheet.

File Sharing: You can now share files from the iCloud drive right within the Cliq app. Tap attach (+) -> Document -> iCloud Drive to get started.

Document Scanner: Convert documents, agreements, checks, business cards, receipts, etc. into crisply cropped pdf with Cliq's Document Scanner. Tap attach (+) -> Document -> Scan a document to get started.

Mark as unread: Continue where you left off and stay in context by marking a conversation as unread. Long tap on a specific message in a chat -> tap Mark as unread to get started.

You asked and we listened.
We're proud to finally unveil the Zoho Cliq app for iPad!
Excited? You should be.
With the iPad app, make sure you send all your files and images to your channels with a simple drag and drop because it’s that easy!
And don't forget to use the split view feature because we know how much you love to multitask. And you know how much you mean to us.

Also, why are you still reading this? Download the app and give it a go already!

Attachment in Forms: Extend your workflows with attachments in Cliq forms. You can now attach files in Cliq forms right within the App.

Message Permalink: Provide more context by navigating to a specific point in a chat. You can copy message permalink from message actions.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Attachment in Forms: Extend your workflows with attachments in Cliq forms. You can now attach files in Cliq forms right within the App.

Message Permalink: Provide more context by navigating to a specific point in a chat. You can copy message permalink from message actions.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Message Permalink: Provide more context by navigating to a specific point in a chat. You can copy message permalink from message actions.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Notification Settings: Have more control in the way you receive notifications with Cliq's new notification settings. 

Storage settings: Make more space with Cliq's new storage settings. You can now clear the media and files you have downloaded... right down to chat level. 

Draft Sync: Type in mobile, send it via the web. That's right, Drafts are now synced across clients. 

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.

Say hello to our new logo! We're excited to reveal Cliq's new, minimalistic and sleek logo!

Our new logo embraces the minimalistic style of using clean, brightly colored line art, and we are pleased to present one that carries the essence of Cliq’s purpose and motto – “Communication, Collaboration and Productivity.”

PrimeTime Assembly: You can now participate in PrimeTime assembly sessions on
company wide announcements and meetings with the PrimeTime Assembly viewer! ​
​
Media Orientation: View images and videos in whichever mode you like. Cliq auto detects
your device orientation to showcase media in landscape or portrait mode. ​
​
Performance improvements: We’ve squashed some bugs and enhanced the app
performance to make it work nice and smooth!

Revamped home screen: Cliq’s home screen is now enhanced to provide a better user experience.
Contextual chat actions: Get contextual chat action suggestions to add a user as chat participant. This option works only when a user who’s not a participant is @mentioned in the chat!
Device connection status: All new in-app banner to show your devices’ connection status
Mark as unread in chat actions: Mark messages as unread directly from the chat list view.
Organised unreads: Unread chats view has a new Muted section. All unread messages from your muted chats are listed there, making it easier for you to pay attention to other priority chats.
View message edit history: Click on the edited tag right next to a message to open the message’s edit history.
Reply with an image: You can now reply to messages with an image.

Sync night mode with device theme: You can now sync Cliq's night mode with the device's theme.

New share extension: We have completely redesigned the share extension of Cliq. Now it's easy to view, search, and select chats from share extension.

Auto-timed status updates: Sync your status based on your activity across Zoho Apps.

Away status: You can now set away status right within the app.

Push notification changes: We have changed the way the app's notification flow works. Check out our forum for detailed info.

Read receipts is now available on iOS!
Now you can see whether your message is read by the receiver with the visual indication of a double tick. A quick swipe on over the message to view read info.

With this update, we have also fixed the bugs from the last version.
